transcript:
Customer: [unintelligible]

Executive: Hello.

Hello.

Hello.

Haan ji. 

Yeh hai Mahesh ji se baat ho rahi hai?

Haan boliye.

Sir main se baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se senior manager, Govind ji ne aap se baat kari thi. Actually abhi discussion hua tha aapka Govind ke saath right?

Customer: Right right.

Executive: Ji. Aur aapka aapne 9696 pe call bhi kiya tha jo hamara customer care number hai. To abhi kuch doubt aa raha hai kya services vagera se related sir?

Customer: Mere ko leads zero ho gayi thi to unhone bataya send se renew hua hai.

Executive: Hmm. Accha accha. Theek hai. To just main usi ke liye call karke ki agar services mein koi problem aa raha hai to apan ek baar discuss karke final karenge. Baki sir agar matlab koi bhi services se related agar aapko problem aata hai to Govind ka directly number nahi hai kya aapke paas? Govind ka personal number?

Customer: Nahi mere paas save nahi kiya.

Executive: Okay. Main ek baar Govind ko bolti hu ki woh aapko apna personal number provide kar dega WhatsApp pe. Aapko agar kuch bhi dikkat hota hai services se related to aap directly unko hi coordinate karna. Theek hai? Kyunki abhi woh aapke customer care vahi hai. Agar aap customer care pe bhi call karte ho to unke paas hi sab call land hongi. Aap unse proper discussion karo koi bhi dikkat aa raha hai to aap directly unko coordinate kar sakte ho. Theek hai?

Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: Baki aapka renewal se related bhi discussion hua hoga sir aapka jaise ki end date hai 2 December ko. Matlab woh ek tarah se aapka grace period pe hi hum aapka catalog chala rahe hain. Agar main aapka last payment date ki baat karu to aapne jo last payment kiya tha woh main ek baar aapko bata deti hu last payment kab hua tha. To yeh aap se actually connectivity nahi ho pa rahi thi aapne yeh jo payment kiya tha sir last time yeh actually 9th November ko hi aapka payment hua tha.

Theek hai?

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: To haan to abhi jaise kya hai ki hum aapko suggest kar rahe hain sir aajkal mein agar aap karvayenge to hum wohi price offer kar rahe the.

Customer: Mere ko conversion nahi mila hai to maine unko bola ki mera conversion aayega mere ko bilkul puchega to main aake baat karenge.

Executive: Accha. To sir ek cheez bataiye itne time se matlab hum pure saal humne services use kiye. To pure saal mein kaun use kar raha tha sir aap use kar rahe the services ya phir kaun use kar raha tha? Aap use kar rahe the to pure saal mein aapne yeh bataiye hai ki services mein kya dikkat aa raha hai nahi aa raha hai?

Customer: Pehle to customers ko aate the matlab hamara import ka kaam hai hum humare se best rate ka koi de nahi sakta hai to bhi woh rate aise aise mangte the phir maine beech mein use karna band kar diya tha uske baad aapki taraf se call aaya phir main phir se use kar raha hu but abhi tak mujhe koi conversion mila nahi hai.

Executive: Accha. To sir actually kya hota hai main bata deti hu jaise main aapka chart dekh rahi hu ek bari.

Main jaise aapka chart dekh rahi thi na ki aapne kaise kaise services ko use kiya hai theek hai? To main yaha pe dekh rahi thi sir dekho main manti hu ki aapko IndiaMART se agar utna response accha nahi mila hoga to aap vaha par dissatisfied hue honge right main woh cheez mana nahi karungi. Lekin main yeh bilkul nahi bolungi ki IndiaMART par sir business nahi hai aapki product line mein. Main jaise dekh rahi hu aapne abhi ek saal hi IndiaMART ka services use kiya hai sir abhi naya naya hi aapne ek saal use kiya hai right isse pehle aap IndiaMART par nahi the.

Right? To main jaise dekh rahi hu December se hi aapka dekh rahi hu jaise aapka 2 December ko end hai theek hai? Main December se hi aapka dekh rahi thi ki December mein jab aapka services live hua hai to us mahine aapne sirf 28 by lead use kiya hai usme bhi sir aapko jo ek mahine mein by lead IndiaMART deta hai basic mein woh 68 by lead offer karta hai aur humne jo by lead consume kiye to pure mahine mein hum sirf 20 by lead hi consume kar paaye. Theek hai? Same as it is agar main January February ki baat karu main pura aapko chart dikha sakti hu.

To January mein aapne pure mahine mein 7 by lead consume kiye February mein pura zero hai sir March mein phir 4 by lead consume kiye April mein 8 May June July aapne bilkul kaam nahi kiya zero consumptions hai. To sir yaha pe jab aap yeh sochti jab aap by lead consume nahi karenge to aapko conversions kaise aayenge sir?

Ab ek cheez socho ki IndiaMART ko bhi pata hai sir ki aap yeh do char by lead jo mahine mein consume kar rahe hain us consumptions se aapka conversion nahi aane wala hai tabhi kahi na kahi aapko ek mahine mein woh 68 by lead offer karta hai.

Iske alava inquiry alag aati hai sir aapke paas iske alava calls alag aati hai aapke paas right? To jab tak aap proper activation nahi rakhenge jaise aapko ek mahine mein 68 by lead mil rahi hai hai na? To main yeh keh rahi hu sir aap 68 ki 68 by lead agar aap consume nahi kar pa rahe hain to at least aap mahine mein 30 se 40 by lead to consume kar sakte hain sir. Itna to hum kar sakte hain na by lead consume?

Kyuki sir dekho offline mein bhi ek aad ek do mahine se kar hi raha hu main. Sir. December mein bhi do mahine mein main agar October November ki baat karu to aapka jo consumptions hai sir 15 by lead hai October mein aur 14 by lead hai November mein abhi tak. To aap yeh keh sakte ho ki haan November mein aapne accha startup kiya hai use karna ki 6 din abhi November mein gaye hain usme aapne 14 by lead consume kar liye.

Theek hai? To yeh main maan sakti hu ki November mein aap accha khasa by lead consume kar rahe ho lekin isse pehle pure saal aapne services pe mere according to sir kuch bhi kaam nahi kiya hai. Genunely agar main aapko batau. Kyunki 10 by lead aur 4 by lead se kuch nahi hone wala hai sir aap ek cheez sochiye offline mein bhi agar apna shop khol ke baith rahi hu na kisi bhi product line ka to vaha pe na jitne bhi buyer mere catalog par aayenge un sabko retain mere ko karna padega jitne bhi mere shop pe aayenge un sabko mere ko retain karna padega chahe woh product mujhse le woh na le aap vaha pe unko product dikhaoge prices bataoge right? Tab jaake kahi na kahi usme se ek ya do aap se deal leke jaate hain.

To mera kehne ka vahi matlab hai ki aapko IndiaMART par bhi same tarike se kaam karna hai sir. Bas farak itna aa jata hai ki vaha pe aap samne face to face discussion kar paate ho yaha pe aapko call pe discussion karna hai. Right? To vahi cheez aapko yaha pe bhi karna hai aur jitni jyada by lead pe active rahenge na aapka inquiry aur call ka flow utna hi badhega. Agar hum usse active hona band kar denge to hamara inquiry call ka flow bhi kam ho jayega sir. Theek hai? To jaise main abhi aapke area mein hi dekh rahi hu sir jaise hum basic services use kar rahe hain lekin aapke area mein hi company hai sir Prabhu Trader ho gaya Jagdish yeh Hularam ho gaya sir iske alava aur bhi bahut sari company hai Shivam Cashew Industries ho gayi aap jante hain in companiyon ko?

Customer: Ji. Prabhu wale. Ji. Ab yeh company ab bataiye ab yeh company same product line mein deal kar rahi hai aur yeh companiya aapke area mein sir TrustSeal use kar rahi hain. To kaise use kar rahi hongi sir jaha pe humne mahine ek saal ka 30000 40000 pe kiya hua hai yeh ek yeh vaha par 80000 90000 investment kar rahe hain. To aap ek cheez bataiye sir IndiaMART par agar business nahi hota to woh to sabke liye hi nahi hota sir.

Customer: Prabhu Traders aapke saath sabse connected hai.

Executive: Sorry. Prabhu Traders wala aapke aapke saath sabse connected hai. Prabhu Traders main bata deti hu 7 saal se membership mein hai woh IndiaMART ke saath sir. Every year woh purchase karte hain. Bilkul bilkul bilkul sir sir yeh aapko bata rahi hu 7 saal se woh IndiaMART par hai aur woh abhi TrustSeal use kar rahe hain IndiaMART ka. Hum to basic service use kar rahe hain na aap se sir aap se ek step upar ki service hoti hai TrustSeal usme jaise basic mein kya hai sir basic mein na aapki jo visibility hoti hai woh sirf local market tak rehti hai. Theek hai? But agar aap TrustSeal convert karate hain na to TrustSeal mein aapko jo visibility milti hai woh 250 to 300 ke range tak aapki visibility ho jati hai. Theek hai? Plus saath mein aapko IndiaMART na jaise aap sir normally aapne suna hoga ki companiya na ISO certified karati hain apni companiyon ko. Hmm. Aapne suna hoga jiske alava agar aap food se related aapka product hai to vaha par FSSAI jo aapka hota hai verified woh aapka alag aa raha tha hai is saal. Theek hai? To same vaise hi IndiaMART aapko na TrustSeal verified kara ke deta hai aapka catalog theek hai jisme hum aapko TrustSeal ka ek certificate provide karte hain sir TrustSeal ka ek logo provide karte hain hum theek hai jo ki hum aapka proper na catalog par yeh cheez hum na visible karate hain aur saath mein jo TrustSeal ka certificate hota hai woh hum aapko offline bhi aapke aapko provide karate hain jo aap apne local market mein apne offline shop pe laga ke certificate ko hard copy aur apne local market ko attract kar sakte ho ki haan aap IndiaMART ke verified supplier ho TrustSeal verified supplier. Theek hai? Plus saath mein isme jo aapki by leads vagera hoti hain aapko by leads improve ho jati hain jaha par aapko MBC mein ek week mein 17 by leads mil rahi hai vaha par aapko TrustSeal mein 34 by lead aapko provide hoga. Theek hai aapki visibility market mein badhegi to aapka number of calls number of inquiries yeh sari cheeze aapki improve hongi. Theek hai ab main aapko yaha par bata du jo Prabhu Traders ki main baat kar rahi hu 2017 se yeh IndiaMART par hai sir theek hai 17 18 se aur yeh abhi jo inhone investment kiya hai sir yaha par TrustSeal 2 year ke liye investment kiya hai yeh 2 year ka services ab TrustSeal mein chala rahe hain. Jiska 2 year ka pricing hai sir 80000 plus GST 94400. For 2 years. For 2 years 80000 plus GST 94400 for 2 years. To aap ek cheez batao aapke area ke hi hain sir agar business nahi hota IndiaMART par aur aapke same product line mein deal kar rahe hain to yeh itna investment kyun karte? Right? To hum to sirf aapko basic ke liye bol rahe hain ki at least aap apni basic visibility maintain karaiye aur is baar main ek kaam aur karva dungi sir ki aapko na agar lag raha hai ki by lead aap apne according nahi le pa rahe ho to main Govind ko bolungi ek bari woh aapka common group create kar dega aur usme woh daily basis pe na woh aapko do by lead aapke product se related bhejenge aap vaha pe consume karo aur aap hume feedback share karo. Theek hai? To is tarike se hum is saal kaam karke dekhte hain sir definitely hum aapko yaha par conversion provide karayenge. But main aapko bolungi sir ki renewal to mat woh boliye ki renewal nahi karana hai ya phir abhi main sochta hu renewal to karate hain sir market visibility bhi bahut matter kar rahi hai aajkal. Hmm. Theek hai? To abhi yeh next week jaane do next ek week aapke saath bol rahe hain vaise kaam karke dekhte hain usme ek bhi conversion aa gaya to apne kaam karenge. Sir aap ek cheez bataiye ek saal tak mein aap services ko properly agar abhi tak humne use nahi kiya hai to vaha pe to sir hamari visibility already down ho rakhi hai vaha pe hume apni visibility hi banane mein humko 15 20 din lag jayenge ki uske according hamari visibility upar aaye kyuki aapki local mein bhi aapki visibility top par nahi dikh rahi hai aur dusra hamara already renewal due chal raha hai to hamara already vaha par visibility down hoga kyuki time se hamare paas agar renewal nahi aayega to aap ek cheez sochiye ki IndiaMART bhi aapki visibility kyun dikhayega vaha pe to phir usko dikhayenge na jo already renewal de de chuka hai ya phir higher services ke liye ja chuka hai. Abhi to mere paas aati hai na pe to main mana nahi karungi sir main vahi bol rahi hu aap by lead consume karo lekin sir renewal to karao aap uske baad hum properly kaam karenge uske saath time dijiye aap force mat kijiye kyuki mere ko abhi tak conversion aaya to business aaya nahi hai main dusron ko dusron ne kya kiya hai woh dikha sir maine to maine to sir aapko aapka chart bhi dikha diya main to aap kaho to agar aapka same number hai to main aapko WhatsApp par bhej deti hu aap khud apna chart dekhiye ki aapka aapki taraf se by lead consumptions kya hai. Mere ko pata hai but woh phir customers aise aare the to phir mera feel nahi ho rahi thi unko consume karne ki. Koi baat nahi aap dekh lijiyega kyuki main abhi aapko isliye bol rahi hu kyuki na hamare paas bhi sir abhi 28000 plus GST ka offer hai aap same services ke liye 28000 plus GST nahi jana chahenge to koi issue nahi aayega isme bada koi issue nahi hai but mere ko jab tak conversion nahi aayega filhaal meri ichcha nahi hai usko renew karne ki ek week aap kaam karke dekhna chahte ho dekhna chahte ho. Koi baat nahi aap ek week kaam kar lo aap ek week kaam kar lo mujhe koi problem nahi hai lekin main phir vahi cheez bolungi sir ki aapki taraf se proper consumptions nahi hai dusra aapke market mein competitions badh chuke hain yeh jo companiya maine aapko batai hai aap agar on video meet dekhna chahte ho to aap ek baar on video meet connect ho jaiye main aapko on video meet dikha dungi screen present karke ki yeh yeh companiya hai aapke area ki aur yeh yeh investment hai unka aap khud dekh lijiyega. To agar aap yeh kar sakte hain to yeh kar lijiye. Koi issue nahi hai aap main next week aap mujhe call kijiyega phir aap. Next week main main aapko kab call karu sir aap mujhe bataiye ek Next week aap Sunday Monday se Monday se meri by leads aayengi Monday se main consume karunga Saturday tak ka time dijiye aap mujhe. Accha to matlab aap yeh keh rahe ho ki main aapko kahi na kahi 14 15 tarikh tak main connect karu aapko. Ji theek hai. Theek hai theek hai sir koi nahi. Ji. Rakhte hain sir theek hai thank you thank you. Baki na ek cheez main aur aapko
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received any conversions.

- Leads had become zero.

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART services.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to have Govind provide personal number.

- Executive explained the importance of by lead consumption.

- Executive explained the benefits of TrustSeal.

- Executive offered to create a common group for by leads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer next week.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, renewal, services
